📃
Privacy Policy:

1. Introduction
Welcome to "%1$s", an application developed by Guillermo Almaguer, also known as Memoeslink. This privacy policy aims to inform you about how we collect, use, safeguard, and disclose information we gather from users of our application.

2. Information Collected
"%1$s" does not automatically collect or store personally identifiable information such as your name, birthdate or other details that may be relevant to customize the predictions. Only the data that the user decides to voluntarily provide through interaction with the application will be collected and used.

3. Use of Information
Any personal information provided by the user is only used for the purpose of personalizing the future predictions provided by our application. This information is not stored in a remote database and is not used for commercial purposes.

The information provided by the user is not used to make decisions that may adversely affect you.

4. Information Security
Since the personal information we collect is not stored in a remote database, the risk of security breaches is significantly lower. However, we strive to use acceptable practices to protect your information.

5. Control Over Your Information
The user has full control over the information provided to the "%1$s" application. You may choose not to provide certain information, but that may limit the application\'s ability to personalize future predictions.

The information provided to "%1$s" can be manually deleted by the user at any time. Also, when the application is uninstalled, all data provided by the user is removed from the application.

6. Changes to This Privacy Policy
"%1$s" reserves the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. We recommend that you review this privacy policy periodically to be aware of any changes.

7. Contact
If you have any questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us:

Guillermo Almaguer (Memoeslink)
Email: memocad@gmail.com

By using "%1$s", you agree to this privacy policy. If you do not agree with this policy, please do not use our application. Your continued use of the application following the posting of changes to this policy will be deemed as your acceptance of such changes.

For more information regarding this, please refer to our complete Privacy Policy.
The application will be restarted so changes can be reflected.
Do you really want to leave?
Thanks a lot for contributing to the project!

Keeps the screen on while the app is active
Enables and allows to configure audio (sounds, voice) from the app
Enable text reading even if app is not being focused
Enables particle generation within the app
Enables a TTS voice that reads texts in the app
Hides the navigation drawer when an item is selected
Keeps form data even after closing the app
Allows the fortune-teller to say opinions about other people
Allows the fortune-teller to say common phrases
Enables a filter that censors profanity in some texts.
Change the time between each phrase from the fortune-teller
Allows the app to save the form data from enquiries
Allows the app to save the entered names so they can be shown as suggestions
Use a seed to generate the aspect and messages from the fortune-teller
Change the text type that can be read in the app
Change the time between each prediction update

string-array.name: astrological_house
string-array.item: 11th – House of Friendships. Friends and acquaintances of like-minded attitudes. Groups, clubs and societies. Higher associations. Benefits and fortunes from career. One\'s hopes and wishes.

12th – House of Self-Undoing. Mysticism and mystery. Places of seclusion such as hospitals, prisons and institutions, including self-imposed imprisonments. Things which are not apparent to self, yet clearly seen by others. Elusive, clandestine, secretive or unbeknownst matters. Privacy, retreat, reflection, and self-sacrifice. Unconscious/subconscious, dreams. Unknown enemies.
1st – House of Self. Physical appearance, traits and characteristics. First impressions. General outlook into the world. Ego. Beginnings and initiatives.
2nd – House of Value. Material and immaterial things of certain value. Money. Belongings, property, acquisitions. Cultivation and growth. Substance. Self-worth.

3rd – House of Communications. Early education and childhood environment. Communication. Happiness. Intelligence. Achievements. Siblings. Neighborhood matters. Short, local travel, and transportation.
4th – House of Home and Family. Ancestry, heritage, roots. Early foundation and environment. Mother or mothers as figure. The caretaker of the household. Comfort. Cyclic end of matters.
5th – House of Pleasure. Recreational and leisure activities. Things which makes for enjoyment and entertainment. Games and gambling. Children. Love and romance. Creative self-expression.

6th – House of Health. Routine tasks and duties. Skills or training acquired. Jobs and Employments. Health and overall well-being. Service performed for others. Caretaking. Pets and small domestic animals.

7th – House of Partnerships. Close, confidante-like relationships. Marriage and business partners. Agreements and treaties. Matters dealing with diplomatic relations of all kinds, including open (known) enemies. Attraction to qualities we admire from the other partner.

8th – House of Reincarnation. Cycles of Deaths And Rebirth. Sexual relationships and deeply committed relationships of all kinds. Joint funds, finances. Other person\'s resource. Occult, psychic and taboo matters. Regeneration. Self-transformation.
9th – House of Philosophy. Foreign travel and foreign countries. Culture. Long distance travels and journeys. Religion. Law and ethics. Higher education. Knowledge. Experience through expansion.

10th – House of Social Status. Ambitions. Motivations. Career. Status in society. Government. Authority. Father or father figure. The breadwinner of the household. One\'s public appearance/impression at-large (audience).

string-array.name: compatibility
string-array.item: Scorpio, Taurus, Cancer, Sagittarius, Virgo, Capricorn.
Taurus, Gemini, Scorpio, Leo, Libra, Cancer.

string-array.name: divination
string-array.item: Something {rand:∅; favorable; unfavorable}, related to {method:getNounWithAnyArticle}, will happen.
You will get {rand:∅; good; bad; rare} news about {method:getNounWithAnyArticle}.
You will get {rand:∅; good; bad; rare} news, related to {string:divination_middle}, from {string:unspecific_person}.
You will get {rand:∅; good; bad; rare} news about {string:divination_middle}.
You\'re gonna have problems with a person whose sign is {string:astrological_sign}.
A person, whose sign is {string:astrological_sign}, will help you with your problems.
A person, whose sign is {string:astrological_sign}, will {rand:harm; benefit; help; abandon; ignore; notice} you.
A person, whose sign is {string:astrological_sign}, will affect you {rand:negatively; positively} in {string:divination_middle}.
You are in a moment where you have to make {rand:∅; critical; hasty; important; well-thought; necessary; essential} decisions about {string:divination_middle}.
In this moment others see you as {a/an} {string:personality_trait} person.
I {rand:see; perceive; visualize; contemplate} an image of {string:augury_entity} {string:augury_situation}.

string-array.name: divination_appendix
string-array.item: Some keywords, related to this divination, are:
Some things that I can perceive, and that are part of divination, are:
These things also appear during the divination:
These things are part of the divination:
This is related to the divination:
This also appears in the divination:
This is related to the previously mentioned:
These things are related to the aforesaid:
This also appears in the divination:

string-array.name: divination_cause
string-array.item: It seems that this could be due to {string:divination_causative_factor}
Possibly it may be due to {string:divination_causative_factor}
It is presumed that this could be caused by {string:divination_causative_factor}
One could say that this is caused by {string:divination_causative_factor}
If I\'m not mistaken, this is due to {string:divination_causative_factor}
I think this is due to {string:divination_causative_factor}
I guess the above is caused by {string:divination_causative_factor}
I can {rand:see; perceive; perceive; detect; feel; observe; note} that this is due to {string:divination_causative_factor}
It can be said that the {rand:reason; cause; circumstance; reason} of this could be {string:divination_causative_factor}
I can see that the {rand:reason; cause; circumstance; reason} of this might be {string:divination_causative_factor}
The {rand:responsible; cause; motive} of this could be {string:divination_causative_factor}
The divination says that, possibly, the cause of this is {string:divination_causative_factor}
I can {rand:see; perceive; detect; sense; feel; observe; note} in this {rand:fortune; divination; prediction; augury} that {string:divination_causative_factor} could be the cause
It is possible that {string:divination_causative_factor} has something to do with it

string-array.name: divination_end
string-array.item: will be {rand:nice; brilliant; unpleasant; different; fragile; electrifying; great; better; normal; negative; dark; worse; positive; rare; solid; terrible}
will be affected in a positive way
will be affected in a negative way
will be OK, or will get fixed or be repaired
won\'t be OK, or will be damaged
won\'t be fine, or will be as in the worst-case scenario
won\'t be affected in any way
will be adversely affected or diminished
will bring solutions or wellness to other people
will cause troubles or harm to other people
will increase or strengthen {rand:∅; although gradually; suddenly; all of a sudden; slowly; a bit; a lot}
will decrease or deteriorate {rand:∅; although gradually; suddenly; all of a sudden; slowly; a bit; a lot}
will bring good results, benefits or advantages in other areas of your life
will bring bad results, drawbacks or disadvantages in other areas of your life

your {rand:sanity; mental dexterity; mental health; intelligence; common sense}
the dependence from, or on, other people

string-array.item: your relocations and changes of residence
your balance between giving and receiving
your cycles of completion and new beginnings
your balance between giving and receiving
your manifestation of dreams and desires

string-array.item: At any time of the day

actions not made in the past

What you {rand:expect the most; least expect}

with a thin layer of chest hair
with a gentle slope to his nose

string-array.name: opinion
string-array.item: Have you heard about {method:getFormattedActor}? They are my worst enemy.
You look like someone I know, their name is {method:getFormattedActor}.
I have to go with {method:getFormattedActor}. They owe me money.
Have you seen a person named {method:getFormattedActor}?
Your {string:relative}, {method:getFormattedActor} and I are lovers. A real love triangle.
Are you {string:relative} of {method:getFormattedActor}? You look very much alike.
Are you, by chance, {string:relative} of {method:getFormattedActor}? You both share certain traits.
It\'s nice to see you here, unlike {method:getFormattedActor}.
Oh, yes, I revealed a frightening future for {method:getFormattedActor}.
The other day {method:getFormattedActor} asked me to look into their future.
So many tragic stories have been written, like the ones from {method:getFormattedActor}.
Revealing the future is exhausting, and even more so the future of {method:getFormattedActor}.
Many people turn to me, especially {method:getFormattedActor}, {method:getFormattedActor} and {method:getFormattedActor}.
Did you know that {method:getFormattedActor} and {method:getFormattedActor} are a couple?
There is a very cruel fate between {method:getFormattedActor} and {method:getFormattedActor}.
A strong rivalry is building between {method:getFormattedActor} and {method:getFormattedActor}.
Do you want to know what happened to {method:getFormattedActor}?
{method:getFormattedActor} came to me for my secret knowledge.
Beware of {method:getFormattedActor}, they are a very dangerous person.
There is a very nice person named {method:getFormattedActor}.
I like food, especially that made by {method:getFormattedActor}.
There are two people in this world whom you should know. They are {method:getFormattedActor} and {method:getFormattedActor}.
I have many brothers and sisters, and my favorite is {method:getFormattedActor}.
Never go to talk to {method:getFormattedActor}, they\'re very annoying.
Yes, have you seen {method:getFormattedActor}? I need to talk to this person.

Let\'s see, uh, {method:getFormattedActor}, {method:getFormattedActor}, {method:getFormattedActor}, {method:getFormattedActor}, {method:getFormattedActor}, uh… and {method:getFormattedActor}. That\'s it, I\'ve written down the ones I need to predict their future.
If you misbehave, {method:getFormattedActor} will come and take you away.
Have you heard the sad story of {method:getFormattedActor}?
Have you heard the adventures of {method:getFormattedActor}?
Have you heard the good news about {method:getFormattedActor}?
Would you mind letting me figure out something about {method:getFormattedActor}?
Do you like a person named {method:getFormattedActor}?
Tell me if you ever see {method:getFormattedActor}.
Tell me if one day you meet {method:getFormattedActor}.
I am a very busy person. Today I\'m going out with {method:getFormattedActor}.
{method:getFormattedActor} and {method:getFormattedActor} hate each other too much.
{method:getFormattedActor} and {method:getFormattedActor} understand each other very well.
I need to find {method:getFormattedActor}. They owe me money.
I\'m looking for {method:getFormattedActor}. Have you seen them?
It seems that {method:getFormattedActor} has an awful destiny.
I think {method:getFormattedActor} has a good future.
Do you think I\'m not real? {method:getFormattedActor} thinks otherwise.
Somewhere, {method:getFormattedActor} is making plans that will benefit us.
{method:getFormattedActor} always has good things to say about {method:getFormattedActor}.
There are many people to whom I give predictions, but {method:getFormattedActor} is the one I do most.
Do you know the legend of {method:getFormattedActor}?
Fate once indicated that {method:getFormattedActor} and {method:getFormattedActor} would meet, and so they did.
{method:getFormattedActor} has no longer communicated with me, and it is worrisome.
{method:getFormattedActor} is going to do bad things today.
{method:getFormattedActor} will do something very good on this day.
This existence has very curious things, one of them is a person named {method:getFormattedActor}.
Don\'t interrupt me, I\'m watching the life of {method:getFormattedActor}.
It\'s interesting to see what happens with {method:getFormattedActor}.
Quiet! Let me see what happens with {method:getFormattedActor}.
Stop! I need to know what\'s happening with {method:getFormattedActor}.
Hey! I have to know what will happen to {method:getFormattedActor}.
No, no, no, everything is wrong with {method:getFormattedActor}.
And such is the sad life of {method:getFormattedActor}.
Wow! You should see how amazing the life of {method:getFormattedActor} is.
Seeing the future is fun. I like, mainly, to see what happens in the life of {method:getFormattedActor}.
There is a strong tension between {method:getFormattedActor} and {method:getFormattedActor}.
{method:getFormattedActor} and {method:getFormattedActor} apparently hate each other, although they really love each other.
If I had a coin every time {method:getFormattedActor} said something stupid, I\'d be a millionaire.
If I had a coin for every clever thing {method:getFormattedActor} says, I\'d be owing money.
It seems that things are going badly between {method:getFormattedActor} and {method:getFormattedActor}.
Things will go wrong between {method:getFormattedActor} and {method:getFormattedActor}.
{method:getFormattedActor} tries to cause trouble between {method:getFormattedActor} and {method:getFormattedActor}.
{method:getFormattedActor} is a very nice person. You should treat them.
Yeah, I got it. Here is the fate of {method:getFormattedActor}.
You should see what {method:getFormattedActor} is doing.
It seems that {method:getFormattedActor} is doing bad things.
In order to face their destiny, {method:getFormattedActor} does things that they think will avoid it.
Hardly anyone can escape their destiny, especially {method:getFormattedActor}.
Do you believe in destiny? {method:getFormattedActor} once managed to get away with it and avoid it.
The future is something unprecedented, especially for {method:getFormattedActor}.
I need to see {method:getFormattedActor}. It is urgent.
Have you seen {method:getFormattedActor}? I have to tell them something.
If you see {method:getFormattedActor} ask them to pay me.
Do you want to hear about {method:getFormattedActor}?
Be careful with {method:getFormattedActor}, they are harmful to those around them.
You should see {method:getFormattedActor}, they\'re very nice.
Honestly, I\'m tired of predicting the future for {method:getFormattedActor}.
Do you want to know what happened to {method:getFormattedActor}?
Calm down! You will find out soon what will happen to you. I must see what {method:getFormattedActor} will live.
I need to say something to {method:getFormattedActor}!

string-array.name: personality_description
string-array.item: Aquarians are original, independent, and highly intellectual. As an air sign, they are quick thinkers and often see the world from a unique angle. They value freedom and individuality, and are often drawn to what is novel or unusual. However, their independence can lead them to be distant and detached, and they may struggle to connect emotionally with others. Aquarius is known for their altruism and desire to make the world a better place, but they can also be rebellious and stubborn.

Pisces are sensitive, empathetic, and often highly intuitive. As a water sign, they have a strong connection to the emotional realm and often feel others\' emotions as if they were their own. They are dreamers and have a rich inner life, with a vibrant imagination and a desire to escape reality. However, their sensitivity can lead them to be overly impressionable or avoid facing reality. Pisces have a strong desire to help and heal others, but also need to learn to set boundaries to protect themselves.

As the first sign of the zodiac, Aries is often filled with energy, adventure, and pioneering spirit. They are natural leaders who enthusiastically dive into new challenges. They dislike sitting in the background and are always looking for ways to drive personal progress. However, they can be impulsive and sometimes act without considering the consequences. Their sincerity and honesty are commendable, but their straightforward character can inadvertently hurt sensitivities. They may sometimes be seen as selfish or dominating, but it\'s often just their vigor and desire to do things their way.

Taurus is an earth sign and is deeply rooted in its environment. They are known for their reliability, practicality, and ambition. Taurus people are usually very determined and hard-working, which helps them reach high levels of success. However, they can also be stubborn and resist change, preferring security and stability over risk and uncertainty. Taurus has a strong aesthetic sense and often enjoys life\'s comforts and luxuries. While they seem calm and measured on the surface, they also have a passionate and sensual streak.

Geminis are curious, adaptable, and always ready for an adventure. As an air sign, their minds are always on the move, swiftly jumping from one topic to another. They love to learn and share information, making them excellent communicators. However, this mutable energy can also lead to indecisiveness, inconsistency, and a tendency to scatter. While Gemini may be viewed as superficial or inconsistent, their spirit is that of an eternal knowledge-seeker, always looking to understand the world from different perspectives.

Cancers are deeply emotional and sensitive, with a strong sense of empathy toward others. As a water sign, they feel emotions on a deeper level than other signs, and are highly connected to their home and family environment. Cancers value security and comfort, and tend to be very protective of the people they care about. However, their sensitivity can lead them to be shy, reserved, or overly cautious. Their fear of being hurt may cause them to retreat into their shell, making it hard for others to get to know them genuinely.

Leos are known for their charisma, self-confidence, and desire to be in the limelight. They are natural leaders, with a noble and generous spirit that drives them to care for and protect those around them. As a fire sign, Leos are passionate, creative, and full of energy, with a personality that shines brightly. However, this confidence can also turn into arrogance or egocentrism if not kept in check. Leos can be stubborn and dominating, insisting on doing things their way.

Virgos are practical, meticulous, and detail-oriented. As an earth sign, they are deeply rooted in the material world and seek to create order and efficiency in everything they do. They are excellent problem solvers, with a sharp and analytical mind that can see the details others overlook. However, this attention to detail can turn into perfectionism, which can lead to anxiety and over-criticism. Although Virgos may appear cold or distant on the surface, they often have a rich inner life and a strong desire to help others.

Libras are known for their sense of justice, balance, and desire for peace. As an air sign, they are excellent communicators and mediators, always looking for ways to harmonize and balance relationships. They have a strong aesthetic sense and enjoy beauty and luxury in all its forms. However, their desire to maintain peace can lead them to avoid conflict and be indecisive. Libras may struggle with authenticity, often sacrificing their own wants or needs to keep others happy.

Scorpios are intense, deep, and passionate. As a water sign, they feel emotions deeply and often have an introspective and mysterious nature. They are extremely loyal and dedicated, but can also be jealous and possessive. They have a great desire to understand the secrets and mysteries of the universe, leading them to be excellent investigators. However, their intensity can be overwhelming, and they may have difficulty opening up to others. Scorpios have a strong will and can be relentless in the pursuit of their goals.

Sagittarians are adventurous, optimistic, and full of enthusiasm. As a fire sign, they are filled with passion and energy, always in search of new experiences and knowledge. They are very independent and value their freedom above all else. However, their desire for freedom can lead them to be irresponsible or reckless, and their honesty can sometimes be blunt. Sagittarius are known for their sense of humor and love for fun, but they can also be impatient and struggle to focus on details.

Capricorns are practical, ambitious, and very hard-working. As an earth sign, they are grounded in reality and seek stability and security. They are highly responsible and disciplined, with an innate ability to plan and organize. However, their ambition can lead them to be overly serious or reserved, and they may have trouble relaxing and enjoying life. Capricorns have a strong sense of duty and responsibility, but they can also be stubborn and have difficulty accepting help from others.

string-array.name: phrase_augury
string-array.item: Let\'s see what the future holds for you.
Let\'s see what we have for you.
Let\'s see what the prediction says.
Do you want me to show you my crystal ball?
Let\'s look at what\'s in your future.
Let\'s see how you will do.
Let\'s see how the world perceives you.
Let\'s know what\'s in your future.
Let\'s know what fate has in store for you.
I will perform the divination right now.
Ready to find out what\'s next?
I\'ll tell you right away what your destiny holds.
Look, here\'s what your destiny indicates:
I\'ll make the prediction for you.
Watch the things that will happen:
Look at what your future shows:
Here is your future at hand.
Look, yes, this is what will happen:
This is what destiny has in store for you:
This will happen, look at it:
If the prediction is accurate, this will happen:
Do you want to know what will happen?
Are you afraid that I will tell you what will happen?
This will happen in the days to come:
This will take place in the days to come:
Do you feel like you\'ve experienced this before?
Things will be like this in the days to come:
These things are going to happen:
These are the facts to come:
These are the events to come:
These are the things that are to come:
The events surrounding your person are:
Tomorrow looks like this for you:
Fortune signals that this will happen:
Do you want to see my magic wand? Ah, I\'m not a wizard, right!
Look closely at what will happen to you:
See what could happen to you:
Are you aware of what could happen to you?
Pay attention! This could happen to you:
Here are some things that could happen to you:
Check this out, it could happen:
Do you know what will happen? Look:
Do you want to know what will happen? Here it is:
This is what my crystal ball shows me:
Look closely at what might happen:
My magic powers allow me to show you this:
In this moment, future shows this:
The world is showing clear signs of what is to come.
The spirits converge here to show the future.
The universe points to certain events.
Nature has patterns and shows that certain events will occur.
Gathered magical forces have news about the future.
There are forces beyond comprehension that show situations that will occur.

string-array.name: salutation
string-array.item: Hi, what are you up to?
Hi, how do you feel today?
Hi, how has your week been?
Hi, nice to see you again!
Hi, what\'s new in your life?
Hi, what good news do you have?
Hi, what\'s happening in your world?
Hi, how are things on your end?
Hi, hope you\'re having a good day!
Hi, it\'s a pleasure to see you!
Hi, how\'s everything in your world?
Hi, what news do you have for me?
Hi, tell me how you are doing!
Hi, what\'s been happening to you?
Hi, hope you\'re having a great week!
Hi, you\'re a sight for sore eyes!
Hi, tell me about your day!
Hi, happy to see you again!
Hi, how are things in your life?
Hi, how does your day look?
Hi, what news do you bring?
Hi, happy to see you once more!
Hi, what does the day bring for you?
Hi, how are you doing this week?
Hi, good to see you again!
Hi, tell me about your week!
Hi, what does the day hold for you?
